description.value:
Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] by spending 2 actions, you can get the effects of the 3-action version instead of the 2-action version.

You can do this with harm if you have harmful font or heal if you have healing font (or both if you have Versatile Font).
